      • getTimeString

        private java.lang.String getTimeString(boolean bonus,
                             long time)
        Converts the provided time to the string representation as found in arrays.xml
        Parameters:
        bonus - True if you want the strings for bonus time, false for normal time strings
        time - The time to convert
        Returns:
        A string representing the current selection
